channel.title: MySQL Question
channel.description: Hello, what I'm trying to do is make a Single instance of MySQLManager, my class that handles all MySQL communications. But i want to make every other class in my server, quests, skills, diaries, etc, be able to use the MySQLManager Class, without creating another instance of the MySQLManager class. Would i just have each of those classes extend to MySQLManager? or would i have to do something else?

item.title: MySQL Question
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Not so sure about this, i would help you though, i can try and find out for you though.

Read full topic
